params.sqlcmd: "select " +" OPR_INST_CD, " +" OPR_RSLT_TEMP_CTL_NO, " +" ITEM_CD, " +" ACPT_QTY, " +" DEFECT_QTY, " +" TO_CHAR(OPR_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd HH24MI') AS OPR_DATE, " +" WH_CD, " +" WS_CD, " +" OPR_RSLT_PERSON, " +" OPR_RSLT_COMMENT, " +" NVL(OPR_TIME_UNIT_TYP,1), " +" NVL(PRE_ARRANGEMENT_TIME,0), " +" NVL(POST_ARRANGEMENT_TIME,0), " +" NVL(OPR_TIME,0), " +" NVL(CESSATION_TIME,0), " +" CESSATION_CAUSE, " +" LOT_NO, " +" VEND_LOT_NO, " +" DEFECT_CAUSE_CD1, " +" DEFECT_QTY1, " +" DEFECT_COMMENT1, " +" DEFECT_CAUSE_CD2, " +" DEFECT_QTY2, " +" DEFECT_COMMENT2, " +" DEFECT_CAUSE_CD3, " +" DEFECT_QTY3, " +" DEFECT_COMMENT3, " +" DEFECT_CAUSE_CD4, " +" DEFECT_QTY4, " +" DEFECT_COMMENT4, " +" DEFECT_CAUSE_CD5, " +" DEFECT_QTY5, " +" DEFECT_COMMENT5, " +" NVL(OPR_CMPLT_FLG,1), " +" NVL(DEFECT_QTY1, 0) + nvl(DEFECT_QTY2, 0) + nvl(DEFECT_QTY3, 0) + nvl(DEFECT_QTY4, 0) + nvl(DEFECT_QTY5, 0) AS SUM_DEFECT_QTY, " +" TO_CHAR(TAKE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" NVL(CHILD_RSLTUPDATE_FLG,1) " +"from " +" T_OPR_RSLT_TEMP " +"where " +" OPR_INST_CD = ? " +" and TAKE_DATE >= TO_DATE(NVL(?,'0001/01/01'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and TAKE_DATE <= TO_DATE(NVL(?,'9999/12/31'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +"order by " +" OPR_RSLT_TEMP_CTL_NO"

"select distinct " +" OPR_INST_CD " +"from " +" T_OPR_RSLT_TEMP " +"where " +" TAKE_DATE >= TO_DATE(NVL(?,'0001/01/01'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and TAKE_DATE <= TO_DATE(NVL(?,'9999/12/31'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +"order by " +" OPR_INST_CD"

"insert into " +" T_LOT_CTRL(LOT_NO, ITEM_CD, PRD_CMPLT_DATE, BEST_BEFORE_DATE, DEL_FLG,CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_PRG_NM, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_PRG_NM, MODIFY_COUNT) " +"values " +" (?, ?, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(?, 1, 10),'YYYY/MM/DD'),DECODE(?,NULL,NULL,TO_DATE(SUBSTR(?, 1, 10),'YYYY/MM/DD')), 1, SYSDATE, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ?, ?, 0)"

"insert into " +" T_OPR_RSLT_TEMP_HISTORY(OPR_RSLT_TEMP_CTL_NO, OPR_INST_CD, ITEM_CD, ACPT_QTY, DEFECT_QTY, OPR_DATE, WH_CD, WS_CD, OPR_RSLT_PERSON, OPR_RSLT_COMMENT, OPR_TIME_UNIT_TYP, PRE_ARRANGEMENT_TIME, POST_ARRANGEMENT_TIME, OPR_TIME, CESSATION_TIME, CESSATION_CAUSE, LOT_NO, VEND_LOT_NO, DEFECT_CAUSE_CD1, DEFECT_QTY1, DEFECT_COMMENT1, DEFECT_CAUSE_CD2, DEFECT_QTY2, DEFECT_COMMENT2, DEFECT_CAUSE_CD3, DEFECT_QTY3, DEFECT_COMMENT3, DEFECT_CAUSE_CD4, DEFECT_QTY4, DEFECT_COMMENT4, DEFECT_CAUSE_CD5, DEFECT_QTY5, DEFECT_COMMENT5, OPR_CMPLT_FLG, TAKE_DATE, TAKE_TYP, RSLT_TAKE_ERR_TYP, RSLT_TAKE_ERR_INFO, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_PRG_NM, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_PRG_NM, MODIFY_COUNT) " +"select " +" OPR_RSLT_TEMP_CTL_NO, " +" OPR_INST_CD, " +" ITEM_CD, " +" ACPT_QTY, " +" DEFECT_QTY, " +" OPR_DATE, " +" WH_CD, " +" WS_CD, " +" OPR_RSLT_PERSON, " +" OPR_RSLT_COMMENT, " +" OPR_TIME_UNIT_TYP, " +" PRE_ARRANGEMENT_TIME, " +" POST_ARRANGEMENT_TIME, " +" OPR_TIME, " +" CESSATION_TIME, " +" CESSATION_CAUSE, " +" LOT_NO, " +" VEND_LOT_NO, " +" DEFECT_CAUSE_CD1, " +" DEFECT_QTY1, " +" DEFECT_COMMENT1, " +" DEFECT_CAUSE_CD2, " +" DEFECT_QTY2, " +" DEFECT_COMMENT2, " +" DEFECT_CAUSE_CD3, " +" DEFECT_QTY3, " +" DEFECT_COMMENT3, " +" DEFECT_CAUSE_CD4, " +" DEFECT_QTY4, " +" DEFECT_COMMENT4, " +" DEFECT_CAUSE_CD5, " +" DEFECT_QTY5, " +" DEFECT_COMMENT5, " +" OPR_CMPLT_FLG, " +" TAKE_DATE, " +" DECODE(?, NULL, '10', '20'), " +" CASE " +" WHEN OPR_RSLT_TEMP_CTL_NO = ? THEN ? " +" ELSE '' " +" END, " +" CASE " +" WHEN OPR_RSLT_TEMP_CTL_NO = ? THEN ? " +" ELSE '' " +" END, " +" SYSDATE, " +" ?, " +" ?, " +" SYSDATE, " +" ?, " +" ?, " +" 0 " +"FROM " +" T_OPR_RSLT_TEMP " +"WHERE " +" TAKE_DATE >= TO_DATE(NVL(?, '0001/01/01'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and TAKE_DATE <= TO_DATE(NVL(?, '9999/12/31'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND OPR_INST_CD = ? " +" AND (? is null or OPR_RSLT_TEMP_CTL_NO = ?)"
"delete from " +" T_OPR_RSLT_TEMP " +"where " +" OPR_INST_CD = ? " +" and TAKE_DATE >= TO_DATE(NVL(?, '0001/01/01'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and TAKE_DATE <= TO_DATE(NVL(?, '9999/12/31'), 'YYYY/MM/DD')"

"select " +" 'ICC' || LPAD(TO_CHAR(SEQ_ICC.NEXTVAL), 10, '0') IDENT_CARD_CTL_NO, " +" T_ITEM.PKG_UNIT_QTY " +"from " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" M_ITEM.PKG_UNIT_QTY " +" FROM " +" M_ITEM " +" where " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = ? " +" ) T_ITEM"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_IDENT_CARD(IDENT_CARD_CTL_NO, OPR_INST_CD, PARTIAL_PRD_NO, RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD, ITEM_CD, JOB_ODR_CD, FIRST_IDENT_CARD_QTY, IDENT_CARD_QTY, OPR_DATE, PKG_UNIT_QTY, PLANT_CD, WS_CD, PRINT_QTY, PRINT_DATE, PRINT_FLG, CHANGE_FLG, DEL_FLG, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_PRG_NM, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_PRG_NM, MODIFY_COUNT, LOT_NO) " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), ?, ?, ?, 0, NULL, 0, 0, 0, SYSDATE, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ?, ?, 0, ?)"

"select " +" NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(ACPT_QTY), 'fm999999999999999990.0999'), '0.0') AS SUM_ACPT_QTY, " +" NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(DEFECT_QTY), 'fm999999999999999990.0999'), '0.0') AS SUM_DEFECT_QTY " +"from " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +"where " +" OPR_INST_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" COUNT(WH_CD) as WH_CD_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +"WHERE " +" OPR_INST_CD = ? " +" AND WH_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" OPR_INST_CD, " +" PROC_NO " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC TWP " +"WHERE " +" TWP.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND OUTSIDE_TYP = '1' " +" AND ROWNUM = 1 " +"ORDER BY " +" PROC_NO"

"SELECT " +" T1.WH_CD, " +" T2.WORK_ODR_CD, " +" T2.OPR_INST_CD, " +" T2.PROC_NO, " +" T2.WS_CD " +"FROM " +" M_WS T1, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" WORK_ODR_CD, " +" OPR_INST_CD, " +" PROC_NO, " +" WS_CD " +" FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC TWP " +" WHERE " +" TWP.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND OUTSIDE_TYP = '1' " +" AND PROC_NO > ? " +" AND ROWNUM = 1 " +" ORDER BY " +" PROC_NO " +" ) T2 " +"WHERE " +" T1.WS_CD = T2.WS_CD"

"SELECT " +" T2.WORK_ODR_CD, " +" T1.OPR_INST_CD, " +" T1.PARTIAL_PRD_NO, " +" T2.PROC_NO, " +" T1.WH_CD " +"FROM " +" T_OPR_RSLT T1, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" TWP.WORK_ODR_CD AS WORK_ODR_CD, " +" TWP.OPR_INST_CD AS OPR_INST_CD, " +" TWP.PROC_NO AS PROC_NO, " +" T3.WH_CD AS WH_CD, " +" TWP.WS_CD AS WS_CD " +" FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC TWP, " +" M_WS T3 " +" WHERE " +" TWP.WS_CD = T3.WS_CD " +" AND TWP.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND OUTSIDE_TYP = '1' " +" AND PROC_NO < ? " +" AND ROWNUM = 1 " +" ORDER BY " +" TWP.PROC_NO DESC " +" ) T2 " +"WHERE " +" T1.OPR_INST_CD = T2.OPR_INST_CD"
"SELECT " +" COUNT(WORK_ODR_CD) AS DATA_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"WHERE " +" WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND OUTSIDE_TYP = '2'"
